title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2004.8 - Exception status
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2004.8 - Exception status

State Regulations
A lender or educational institution may be placed upon
exception status whenever the corporation receives complaints or information
from the Attorney General, the State or Federal Education Departments, the

Consumer Protection Board or other sources which indicate the program is not
being properly administered. The lender or institution shall be notified of
such status if it is continuously maintained for more than 10 business days
unless withholding such notice is necessary to protect the confidentiality of
an investigation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2004.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
